Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by New Jersey in 1969...
Injured on 6/6/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 8/24/1969, off Paul Mallow (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/12/1969, off Adrian Northington (CBC)...
Injured on 4/4/1971 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Hit 4 homeruns against Malibu, driving in 8 runs on 9/21/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1971, hitting .455 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1972, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1972, hitting .448 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1973, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
